item.title: Deuced
item.description: Deuce is a playground for intriguing recipes that revel in robust flavours.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Deuce is a playground for intriguing recipes that revel in robust flavours.

item.title: Deuce
item.description: Lunch at Fiji's Viwa Island Resort is a calm, cheerful affair of carrot salads and fish curries - wholesome, vibrant nourishment after a morning spent visiting the exuberant schoolchildren of a remote village on Fiji's westernmost island in the South Pacific Ocean.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Lunch at Fiji's Viwa Island Resort is a calm, cheerful affair of carrot salads and fish curries - wholesome, vibrant nourishment after a morning spent visiting the exuberant schoolchildren of a remote village on Fiji's westernmost island in the South Pacific Ocean.

item.title: Isabel
item.description: Twenty-one years ago, Alexis was born in Bangsar, ushering in the Sarawak laksa, tiramisu cake and pavlova that have since become instantly identifiable with one of KL’s most enduring modern restaurants.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Twenty-one years ago, Alexis was born in Bangsar, ushering in the Sarawak laksa, tiramisu cake and pavlova that have since become instantly identifiable with one of KL’s most enduring modern restaurants.

item.title: Paperbird x Whimsical
item.description: Malaysian chef Chester Low, who's stamped his mark in recent years as a skilled and imaginative talent in KL's independent F&B terrain, has now taken over the kitchen of Solaris Dutamas' gelateria Whimsical, in a long-overdue career maneuver from culinary consultant to the master of his own menu.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Malaysian chef Chester Low, who's stamped his mark in recent years as a skilled and imaginative talent in KL's independent F&B terrain, has now taken over the kitchen of Solaris Dutamas' gelateria Whimsical, in a long-overdue career maneuver from culinary consultant to the master of his own menu.

item.title: Niuzexui Food Court
item.description: PJ’s latest hawker food court is a microcosm of the country on one breezy boulevard, led by the hornbill state specialities of stallkeeper Aunty Lan.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: PJ’s latest hawker food court is a microcosm of the country on one breezy boulevard, led by the hornbill state specialities of stallkeeper Aunty Lan.

item.title: Gallo Wine Bar
item.description: Sleek, stylish bistros and bars in Taman Desa and Sri Petaling - the two branches of Gallo Wine Bar are hidden havens, ideal for an idyllic evening of wining and dining, their soothing spaciousness filled with comfy couches and plush sofas for patrons to sink into, amid a gently lit ambiance accented with elegant flourishes of wine racks, wood panels and mirror-tiled ceilings.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Sleek, stylish bistros and bars in Taman Desa and Sri Petaling - the two branches of Gallo Wine Bar are hidden havens, ideal for an idyllic evening of wining and dining, their soothing spaciousness filled with comfy couches and plush sofas for patrons to sink into, amid a gently lit ambiance accented with elegant flourishes of wine racks, wood panels and mirror-tiled ceilings.

item.title: Okra
item.description: Malacca by way of Sarawak: Okra offers Nyonya cuisine that stems from recipes that Alicia Joseph, an indigenous Melanau, learned from her food-caterer mom while growing up in Sibu.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Malacca by way of Sarawak: Okra offers Nyonya cuisine that stems from recipes that Alicia Joseph, an indigenous Melanau, learned from her food-caterer mom while growing up in Sibu.

item.title: Alfred, Oslo
item.description: Named for Alfred Nobel, the resident cafe of Oslo's Nobel Peace Centre is a placid stop for a sandwich of Norwegian smoked trout bolstered by butter from Raros, Snofrisk cream cheese, caraway and capers.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Named for Alfred Nobel, the resident cafe of Oslo's Nobel Peace Centre is a placid stop for a sandwich of Norwegian smoked trout bolstered by butter from Raros, Snofrisk cream cheese, caraway and capers.

item.title: New Chef: Mandarin Grill
item.description: Born in Argentina's wine-producing province of Mendoza, chef Sebastian Barcudes hails from a heritage that embraces the pleasures of the palate.
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Born in Argentina's wine-producing province of Mendoza, chef Sebastian Barcudes hails from a heritage that embraces the pleasures of the palate.

item.title: Food by Fat Cat
item.description: The big dogs are romping into Sunway Geo Avenue: Food by Fat Cat feels purr-fect for a cheerful lunch, marking a new collaboration between Jaya Grocer and the culinary team behind Damansara Uptown's popular cafes The Good Batch and Nara Kitchen & Co
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: The big dogs are romping into Sunway Geo Avenue: Food by Fat Cat feels purr-fect for a cheerful lunch, marking a new collaboration between Jaya Grocer and the culinary team behind Damansara Uptown's popular cafes The Good Batch and Nara Kitchen & Co

item.title: Divers Hideout Cafe
item.description: A massive, menacing shark mural ushers customers into KL's first diving-themed cafe, its interior bedecked in the ocean's undulating blue
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: A massive, menacing shark mural ushers customers into KL's first diving-themed cafe, its interior bedecked in the ocean's undulating blue

item.title: Menya Kotetsu
item.description: Ramen addicts, add Menya Kotetsu to your list of destinations: The speciality here is the spicy miso ramen topped with Hokkaido-style zangi - two very chunky slices of crunchy, thickly battered chicken thigh meat, juicy with hints of a soy, ginger and garlic marinade
item.author: Sean Yoong

media:content.media:description: Ramen addicts, add Menya Kotetsu to your list of destinations: The speciality here is the spicy miso ramen topped with Hokkaido-style zangi - two very chunky slices of crunchy, thickly battered chicken thigh meat, juicy with hints of a soy, ginger and garlic marinade
